content: Deng Cai Deng Cai Email: dengcai AT gmail DOT com dengcai AT cad DOT zju DOT edu DOT cn About me I am currently a full professor in the College of Computer Science at Zhejiang University, China. I received the PhD degree from University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign. My research interests include machine learning, computer vision, data mining and information retrieval.
